channel.title: North Tyneside on North of Tyne LPC
channel.description: Recent content in North Tyneside on North of Tyne LPC

item.title: North Tyneside Locality HLP Meeting
item.description: Date: Wednesday 20th November 2019 Time: 10.00 – 12.00 Location: - North Tyneside Council | The Silverlink North | Newcastle upon Tyne | United Kingdom | NE27 0BY Registration: - Refreshments: - Tea and coffee will be available Notes: This meeting is for all North Tyneside community pharmacies accredited as Healthy Living Pharmacies (HLP) or working towards HLP accreditation. This meeting is open to those staff who will be or are currently training to be Health Champions.
